name: Last Call.
description:
Made for the 2022 VR JAM!

VR Horror

Last call is about being stuck on a train with little or no way out. Puzzles must be solved very skillfully but with the time you have. This train might be empty but it doesn't feel alone as something lurks in the void of light you leave behind...

Team:

  • VR Programmer: Adam(Discord: OiMumWhatTheHell#3209)
  • 3D Programmer: Nic(Discord: imtrash#9516)
  • Creature Artist: Seth (Discord: BudKnight#8330 )
